other_tests.findings: Diagnosis of left ventricular noncompaction (LVNC) and double outlet of the right ventricle, in addition to the interruption of the aorta and aortic stenosis.
Worsening heart failure with pericardial effusion, pleural effusion, and ascites.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Heart failure worsened after surgical intervention.

other_tests.findings: Identified a novel heterozygous splicing variant in the MYH7 gene (c.896-1G>A) in the patient and her father; heterozygous missense variant in the CD36 gene (c.760T>C, p.Phe254Leu) in the patient and her mother.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient and her mother showed reduced CD36 expression compared with the father.
